mapper.select: INSERT INTO record (user_no, record_date, content) VALUES (#{userId}, #{recordDate}, CAST(#{contentJson} AS JSONB)) ON CONFLICT (user_no, record_date) DO UPDATE SET content = EXCLUDED.content, updated_at = NOW() RETURNING record_id, user_id, record_date, content::text AS content, created_at, updated_at
SELECT record_id, user_id, record_date, content::text AS content, created_at, updated_at FROM record WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND record_date = #{date} LIMIT 1
SELECT record_id, user_id, record_date, content::text AS content, created_at, updated_at FROM record WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND record_date BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY record_date ASC
